name: path-of-exile-item-filter
description: DEPRECATED: An Atom package designed to make editing Path of Exile item filters easier.

enableGutter.title: Enable Editor Gutter
enableGutter.description: Enable the decoration gutter within the editor whenever an item filter is open.

classWhitelist.title: Item Class Whitelist
classWhitelist.description: Additional item classes usable within item filters. Multiple entries should be separated by a comma.

baseWhitelist.title: Item Base Whitelist
baseWhitelist.description: Additional base types usable within item filters. Multiple entries should be separated by a comma.
